task.title: Create a Twitter App for Use with Livefyre Identity
task.shortdesc: You can use Livefyre Identity with Twitter to allow users to use their Twitter logins to interact Apps on your site.

context.p: To enable Twitter login, Livefyre requires the following Twitter app information:
To create a Twitter App for use with Livefyre Identity:

step.cmd: Go to https://apps.twitter.com/, and sign into your Twitter account to create a new or select an existing app for use with Livefyre Identity.
From the Settings page for the app:

ul.li: Enter Callback URL: https://identity.livefyre.com/{networkName}.fyre.co (where {networkName} is your Livefyre provided network name. For example: labs in labs.fyre.co.)
Select Allow this application to be used to Sign in with Twitter.

step.cmd: From the Permissions tab, select Access: Read only.

taskbody.result: When complete, Twitter’s Application Management > Keys and Access Tokens page will list the app’s Consumer Key (API Key) and Consumer Secret (API Secret) for use in Studio’s Integration Settings page.
